document_data.name: Drool
document_data.mainbody: '''Drool''' was an [[ogre]] at the [[Sacred Stone Monastery]] during the [[Elemental Evil]] crisis in [[1491 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Drool acted as a subterranean guard and jailer of the monastery, under the orders of [[Jurth]].
document_data.Personality: Drool was a simpleton, not really understanding what was going on. He believed he could make jurth happy by torturing the prisoners.
document_data.History: Some adventurers infiltrated the monastery and in the end confronted and defeated Drool, Jurth, and his minions.
